original: Jonsson, Folke, generalkonsul. Släp, f. 19/5/86 i Gbg av dir. Axel J. o. Ragnhild Lundgren. G. 09 m. Olga Mimms Dawson. Barn: Anita f. 10, g. m. Sven Hansson, Gbg, William 11, avd :chef i Jonsson, Sternhagen & Co., Gbg, Mary 13, g. m. ing. Gunnar Lau-renius, Gbg, Sonja 14, g. m. Lennart Hèrnod, Sthlm, Sigrid 17, g. m. adv. Charles Hov^ell, Florida, Bo Erling 18, sergeant i amer. armén, Gunilla 20, g. m. tandl. Arne Södergren, Gbg, Folke j :r 22, stud. v. coll. i Florida, Claes Herbert 30, befälselev. — Gbgs hand:inst. 03-04, prakt, i Engl. u. Frankr. Anst. i firma Jonsson, Stern-hagen & Co. i Gbg fr. 04, deläg. 14, verkst. dir. efter firmans ombildn. t. A-B. Bulgariens gen:konsu’l i Gbg sed. 34. Led. av styr. f. Förnyade Ångf. A-B Götha, Bark & Warburgs Förn. A-B o. Strömman & Larssons Nya A-B, kassaförvalt. i Gbgs jaki-sällsk. S’tift. o. led. av styr. f. dess jägarkl., fd. ordf. i Gbgs roddfören., num. hed:led. där. Hobby: jakt. KBulgCfO, KBulgSrtAO, Gbgs roddfören. GM, PatrstGM.
translated: Jonsson, Folke, Consul General. Born on May 19th, 1886 in Gothenburg to director Axel J. and Ragnhild Lundgren. Married in 1909 to Olga Mimms Dawson. Children: Anita born in 1910, married to Sven Hansson in Gothenburg, William born in 1911, department head in Jonsson, Sternhagen & Co. in Gothenburg, Mary born in 1913, married to engineer Gunnar Laurenius in Gothenburg, Sonja born in 1914, married to Lennart Hèrnod in Stockholm, Sigrid born in 1917, married to lawyer Charles Hovell in Florida, Bo Erling born in 1918, sergeant in the American army, Gunilla born in 1920, married to dentist Arne Södergren in Gothenburg, Folke Jr. born in 1922, studying at a college in Florida, Claes Herbert born in 1930, a cadet. Attended Gothenburg Commercial Institute from 1903-1904 and received practical experience in England and France. Employed at the firm Jonsson, Sternhagen & Co. in Gothenburg from 1904, became a partner in 1914, and became managing director after the company was reorganized as A-B. Bulgarian Consul General in Gothenburg since 1934. Member of the boards for Renewed Steamship Co. A-B Götha, Bark & Warburgs. Member of the finance committee in the Gothenburg Hunting Association Foundation and a member of the board for its hunting club. Former chairman of the Gothenburg Rowing Association, and an honorary member. Hobby: hunting. Knight Commander of the Bulgarian Order of Civil Merit, Knight of the Bulgarian Order of Stara Planina, Grand Master of the Gothenburg Rowing Association, and Patriotic Grand Master.

employment.name: Renewed Steamship Co. A-B Götha, Bark & Warburgs
